key_facts: Pegasus has been extensively used to monitor and track journalists, human rights activists, and dissidents globally.
The investigation is a two-part series titled 'Global Spyware Scandal, Exposing Pegasus' by Frontline, in collaboration with Forbidden Films.
NSO Group was established with the ambition to make the world a safer place.
Pegasus spyware is described as a 'military weapon used against civilians', highlighting its dangerous nature.
There is a significant lack of control over how countries use Pegasus, leading to its reported misuse.
